entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Snow beginning late in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023
